feed.title: Leantime Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.3.1
entry.content:
Changes in this Release

  • Fix for BASE_URL/APP_URL issue
  • Fix for configuration.php support (also now officially deprecated)
  • Fix for open basedir restriction issue on avatar creation
  • Fix for cache prefixes on cluster mode

History from v3.3.0 to @

Commits

  • b667cc56e [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.1
  • 9285883d0 Update StringableMacros.php
  • 138de0e81 update comments for phpstan
  • 671794ba6 mixin updates
  • ab23d1195 Adding comments for phpstan
  • 4eabdb19e Resolving open basedir restrictions with font files in avatar generation scripts
  • c4032e009 Version bump
  • 1875f07c9 code style fixes
  • 8ad64a64c Update .gitignore
  • 99357d001 Deprecate configuration.php file and create backward support
  • cbc8affd3 Ensure current project is selected for new sprints
  • 6da255a38 Fix debug calls in ldap service
  • e1f8943b7 code style fixes
  • 9aa3ffb1d code style fixes
  • ded3cac47 Fix constant url handling
  • 60ed1c16a Move BASE_URL set to config bootstrap to fix mixed url issue #2787
  • beccd6c1e Fixing cache pre-fix issues when using redis cluster
  • 93359df9f [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.0

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (16 commits)

Files

.gitignore | 1 + .idea/php.xml | 63 ++++++++ CHANGELOG.md | 167 ++++++++++++++++++++++ app/Core/Bootstrap/LoadConfig.php | 42 ++++++ app/Core/Configuration/AppSettings.php | 2 +- app/Core/Configuration/Environment.php | 7 + app/Core/Configuration/laravelConfig.php | 58 ++++---- app/Core/Db/Db.php | 2 +- app/Core/Fileupload.php | 13 +- app/Core/Http/HttpKernel.php | 2 +- app/Core/Http/IncomingRequest.php | 35 +---- app/Core/Middleware/LoadPlugins.php | 15 +- app/Core/Middleware/StartSession.php | 2 + app/Core/Providers/Cache.php | 7 +- app/Core/Providers/LoadMacros.php | 26 ++++ app/Core/Providers/Redis.php | 41 ++++-- app/Core/Support/StringableMacros.php | 36 +++++ app/Domain/Api/Controllers/Projects.php | 2 +- app/Domain/Api/Controllers/Users.php | 2 +- app/Domain/Auth/Templates/userInvite.tpl.php | 111 -------------- app/Domain/Ideas/Repositories/Ideas.php | 4 + app/Domain/Ldap/Services/Ldap.php | 18 +-- app/Domain/Plugins/Services/Registration.php | 8 +- app/Domain/Projects/Repositories/Projects.php | 17 ++- app/Domain/Sprints/Templates/sprintdialog.tpl.php | 21 +-- app/Domain/Users/Repositories/Users.php | 18 ++- app/helpers.php | 70 +++++++++ composer.json | 2 +- composer.lock | 2 +- config/configuration.sample.php | 6 +- config/sample.env | 2 +- makefile | 2 +- package.json | 2 +- public/dist/mix-manifest.json | 30 ++-- tests/Unit/app/Core/ApplicationUrlTest.php | 111 ++++++++++++++ 35 files changed, 686 insertions(+), 261 deletions(-)

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes colliding file by @lizhineng in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2805
  • Synchronizing translation files with crowdin by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2782
  • Fixes issue where milestones without end dates are causing 500 error by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2808
  • Fixes wrong dates in milestone calendar header by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2799
  • Api Fix for authentication and new set of unit tests by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2811
  • Update Project Notification Event by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2813
  • Csv importer fixes by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2814

New Contributors

  • @lizhineng made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2805

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.3.1...v3.3.2

History from v3.3.1 to @

Commits

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Info: The updater CLI command was fixed in this release. When updating a regular install please follow the instructions for a manual update (just replace the files with the ones in the release package)

  • Laravel auth service by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2823
  • Improved Avatar Handling by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2826
  • Fixing user role issue for manager by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2828
  • Fix missing value submission for notifications checkbox #2818 by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2827
  • Performance improvements by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2829
  • Updated language file manager for plugins by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2832
  • CLI updates fixing updater and backupDb command by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2833
  • CSV validation improvements by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2834

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.3.2...v3.3.3

Commits

  • b811bfa36 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.3
  • 752bfec26 Version Bump
  • f44dbb8fc style fixes
  • 6828e9c04 Check for datetime parsing and sprint verification
  • 22d28a514 Fixes updater and backup creator
  • 87e377482 Updating how we load language files from plugins and caching them
  • 838c83679 Update bug_report.yml
  • 8b804d4ab Update UpdateLeantime.php
  • fd340969d Update Registration.php
  • 706991635 LanguageFile Registration improvements
  • 3a0aa4a4a fix code styles
  • ee7991394 Improving eventDispatcher findListener call and settings repo
  • 177d5143f Fix styles and ignore generated files in pint
  • 743beee87 Code style fixes
  • ad64371e7 Fix access issues regarding manager role #2820
  • 3619037a7 code style fix
  • 28343d36d Fix issue with api guard not having access to apikey
  • 120f57869 Fix missing value submission for notifications checkbox #2818
  • 29ad2e6bf Fixing code style
  • ee6285bd7 Add unit tests
  • 73af0b656 Create new avatar creator support class and ensure avatars can be generated in various languages and encodings
  • 936dcbf68 fix code styles
  • 4e2c859a8 Fix authcheck missing parameter
  • 5d18d8cc1 Using laravel auth and adding leantime as auth provider.
  • fabd4091d Check translations strings
  • d18f0c834 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.2

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (24 commits)

Files

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Highlights

Infra (Stability, Performance)

  • Authentication system has been updated and aligned to Laravel authentication handler enhancing security resilience and more integrations
  • Marketplace integration and plugin installation improved
  • Improvements to cache handling
  • Improved handling of proxy server set ups
  • Improved configuration management
  • Refactor db service to use Laravel db manager (for future replacement and support of Postgres, SQLite etc)
  • Refactored Event Manager to be compatible with Laravel event manager
  • More unit tests

UI

  • New ticket design to improve cognitive load
  • UI cleanup
  • Many, many bug fixes 3.4.0 Bugs

ðŸš¨ Breaking Changes

  • YAML configuration files are not supported anymore. Please move to .env files

Details

  • [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2835
  • Bump league/commonmark from 2.5.3 to 2.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2853
  • ITKDev: Added session to API users by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2903
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2918
  • feat: improve roadmap date handling and milestone retrieval by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2926
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2924
  • Update UpdateLeantime.php by @Er1c85 in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2844
  • Bump guzzlehttp/oauth-subscriber from 0.6.0 to 0.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2883
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2935
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2937
  • fixes unescaped string by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2941

New Contributors

  • @Er1c85 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2844

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.3.3...v3.4.0

Changes in this Release

History from v3.3.3 to @

Commits

  • 3006fe6bf [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.0
  • 31f2ce78a fix user issue
  • 793197951 bugfix for project duplication
  • 20c4ba64c Escaping content for email messages
  • 5fdb46467 fixes unescaped string
  • 2a5045f61 Improved cache control
  • 759e1e39b Plugin page improvements
  • 14df6b257 Update source file en-US.ini
  • d0567316d endpoint to get current leantime version #1152
  • d9e9a1743 Fix broken timer on ticketmodal #2849
  • 9fa14c28f Fix broken timer on ticketmodal #2845
  • a80566263 ticket table pager issue
  • 440c4a4e9 update leantime color
  • ca1488e66 Ensure that url changes will be reflected in widget dashbaords
  • 759a3c18a Ensure notification links go to places #2929
  • 1649f52f7 clean up user class
  • b5228d306 Fix upload image issue #2919
  • 58beaab73 Comment out traefik labels
  • d52353195 code cleanup, testing improvement
  • 5ccca20b0 Improve testing environment and fix tests
  • 3eb909dd8 idea files
  • fd0a8ce1a Improved subfolder handling
  • ed101d038 OIDC check for redirects and hardening
  • a30546a27 Update source file en-US.ini
  • 3cdee0cb2 fix failing api tests
  • 6a59ddd81 code style
  • 89b37256b Improve plugin flow and information
  • e18e32ed1 Update update-latest-tag.yml
  • eb278f895 Create update-latest-tag.yml
  • 327fdac82 Minor fixes and updates to cache clearing
  • 5e766ee3f code style fixes
  • b9f03f15c Minor UI updates to notifications
  • 35f9a916f Improve request type identification
  • 41ab1a230 Fix duplicate project issue #2922
  • 93fd06d9f feat: improve roadmap date handling and milestone retrieval
  • a5d487bde New translations en-us.ini (Hebrew)
  • fd0422a76 Duplicate Project Fix
  • 51143da86 New translations en-us.ini (Chinese Traditional)
  • c5f07c9a4 Update source file en-US.ini
  • e1e83b1d0 Dashboard home controller improvements and settings link updates
  • 85226138d Fix broken unit tests
  • f63843e00 Language File Fix for Api Key generation
  • 71e7c982b Fix code style
  • b7e464c25 Fixing, passing unit tests
  • ff1ee5f2d New translations en-us.ini (Hebrew)
  • cd5eaa42b Update source file en-US.ini
  • 6ec2f0bbd CSV Importer fix and makefile improvements
  • 10e01f286 Fixing code style issues
  • 8cc1d2300 Commit missing changes
  • 8f95cbe48 Update EventDispatcher.php
  • ab97534e3 Bump guzzlehttp/oauth-subscriber from 0.6.0 to 0.8.1
  • 180c5f10b Fix code style
  • b18b70e2b Ensure job title can be changed and users can be found with lower or uppercase active flag
  • b1158d9bb Fix for broken avatar creation
  • 4caf75c1d Ical 404 Fix
  • e2f43dd5b Design & Style Improvements
  • 42a570989 CLI improvements and cache fixes
  • 4011dc129 Authentication refactor to use sanctum
  • 7346ccc78 Core Code Cleanup
  • 70f91f9d3 ITKDev: Added session to API users
  • d5e37deba Update README.md
  • c0738ecd8 Update README.md
  • 4b47ec3c5 Bump league/commonmark from 2.5.3 to 2.6.0
  • 1547de962 Update UpdateLeantime.php
  • 3f69ff63a Update Plugins
  • b811bfa36 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.3.3

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (224 commits)
  • Jesper Kristensen (1 commits)
  • Er1c85 (1 commits)

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.1
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Dark Theme Updates (and 2 gray scale color scheme options)
  • Docker Image now supports PUID=1000 and PGID=1000 arguments as well as a a user var to run leantime as non-root
  • Clean up plugin marketplace page

ðŸš¨ Permission issues with the new docker image

Due to the user/group updates on the docker image there is a small chance you run into file permission issues on existing volumes check https://github.com/Leantime/docker-leantime?tab=readme-ov-file#common-issues--solutions for setting the permissions correctly.

Changes in this Release

History from v3.4.0 to @

Commits

  • af0eba406 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.1
  • 66271faa0 task: add manifest and package-lock
  • 943418870 feat: Update Release Version to 3.4.1
  • db913f8f8 Update release.yml
  • 606be4d25 fix: various dark theme bugs and saving theme settings issues
  • 43635f913 fix: Show tasks on milestone page without task parents shows 500
  • 3f3a38997 Update SECURITY.md
  • 435e3f744 Update SECURITY.md
  • f5664556a Update SECURITY.md
  • e9924fbe0 Readme updates
  • 0f9a8310e Additional Readme Updates
  • 85cc204e6 Readme updates and new screenshots
  • a7ca7ebaf Update bug_report.yml

  • eeb676f68 Update plugin.blade.php
  • 3006fe6bf [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.0

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (18 commits)
